content: the campbell everyday crochet cardigan is a casual cardigan with long sleeves and ribbing on the bottom and at the cuffs it can be worn all season and features a simple neckline and opening the cardigan is suitable for beginners using two simple stitches - the half_double_crochet and the treble_crochet there are no button holes or buttons used for this pattern the cardigan would be great for summer and spring in cotton blends and perfect for fall and winter in premium acrylic or wool blends this is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is beginner friendly and uses weight 3/light worsted yarn it uses a crochet hook size 4mm the stitch pattern is simple using primarily half double crochets and treble crochets please note that this pattern is for the cardigan and not for the first layer tops in the photographs
